Text.Page:
My work is being hampered by bureaucracy. The basilisks need to be studied in their natural habitat but we're not allowed into the area!

I know full well the dangers we face but someone has to take the risks!"Can I help?"

Actually, yes. Head out to the Desert Overwatch and deliver my entry permit to Rhysart.

With luck, that will be enough to convince him to let us through.

Save your breath. As I explained last week, permit or not, it's too dangerous to venture in here. The Mysterium lost an agent last week!

I know they're willing, but I have my orders, too.
